subtype.constraint.name: exclusive_product_versions_236cc1
subtype.constraint.super.expression: ONEOF ( Document_version, Part_version, Functional_element_version, Physical_element_version, Product_as_individual, Requirement_version)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( a <* address | SIZEOF( USEDIN( a, schema_name + '.ADDRESS_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_ADDRESS')) =0 ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( p <* Person | SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( p ,schema_name + '.PERSON_IN_ORGANIZATION.CONCERNED_PERSON' )) = 0 )) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY( is <* Item_shape | NOT (schema_name + '.PRODUCT_VIEW_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(is.described_element)) ))= 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY( pai <* Product_as_individual | SIZEOF(USEDIN(pai, schema_name + '.PRODUCT_DESIGN_TO_INDIVIDUAL.INDIVIDUAL_PRODUCT')) + SIZEOF(USEDIN(pai, schema_name + '.PRODUCT_SPECIFICATION_TO_INDIVIDUAL.INDIVIDUAL_PRODUCT')) >1 ))=0
